name: Buster Sword+
description: Made from highly purified steel, improving Attack. Can be further improved.

name: Buster Blade
description: An improved Iron Sword for beginners. A capable weapon against all sorts of beasts.

name: Bone Blade+
description: A Great Sword made with high quality bone. Not as sharp as steel, but very powerful.

name: Bone Slasher
description: A Great Sword made with high quality bone. Not as sharp as steel, but very powerful.

name: Tarnished Great Swd
description: A tarnished weapon that isn't good for much as-is. But if you polish it...

name: Ravager Blade
description: Iron Great Sword with a vicious serrated edge. Can be further improved.

name: Defender
description: A Great Sword that can also serve as a shield. Stresses defensive strength.

name: Sentinel
description: A Great Sword that can also serve as a shield. Stresses defensive strength.

name: White Serpentblade
description: Beautiful Great Sword made from white Giaprey scales. Lined with gold fangs.

name: Silver Serpentblade
description: Beautiful Great Sword made from white Giaprey scales. Lined with gold fangs.

name: Vile Serpentblade
description: The evil version of a Ravager Blade made from sharp claw of a Velocidrome.

name: Golem Blade
description: A Great Sword made from a large bone. Made for the highly experienced.

name: Finblade
description: Bonecraft adds an elemental effect. Shoots high-pressure water from its cutting edge.

name: Chick Decapitator
description: Bears a splendid resemblance to a Kut-Ku Wing by using the fowl's materials.

name: Red Stripe
description: Combines bone with super strong shell material, allowing high Defense.

name: Ravager Blade+
description: ron Great Sword with a vicious serrated edge. Can be further improved.

name: Khezu Shock Sword
description: Made of Khezu. Wrapped in attribute material with an electrified blade.

name: Cat's Soul
description: Sword with a face. Said to hold the soul of a Felyne who defended its master.

name: Barbaroi Blade
description: A great blade housing a raging inferno. The lightest swing ignites an epic blaze.

name: Golem Blade+
description: A Great Sword made from a large bone. Made for the highly experienced.

name: Valkyrie Blade
description: An improved Golem Blade. New, powerful abilities due to fire wyvern materials.

name: Plesioth Watersword
description: Bonecraft adds an elemental effect. Shoots high-pressure water from its cutting edge.

name: Red Wing
description: Great Sword made with a Rathalos wing design. Flame Sac bestows Fire element.

name: Red Pincer
description: A Great Sword made from a giant pincer. Its blade rips of scales and slices meat.

name: Cat's Curse
description: Sword with a face. Said to hold the soul of a Felyne who defended its master.

name: Crimson Goat
description: Elegant Great Sword with a blade wrapped in heat. Light swings cause dancing flames.

name: Halberd
description: Doesn't stay sharp long, but possesses superior Attack. A time-honored favorite.

name: Deadly Serpentblade
description: Made according to tradition from Remobra material. Poison seeps from red fangs.

name: Spartacus Blade
description: Giant, super heavyweight, flat-out powerful Great Sword. Forms a pair.

name: Executioner
description: A Bone Axe with an enormous head. More likely to smash a skull than cut it off.

name: Executioner+
description: A Bone Axe with an enormous head. More likely to smash a skull than cut it off.

name: Plesioth Crystasword
description: Not merely a Sword, this crystal weapon launches a jet of water upon contact.

name: Chicken Decapitator
description: Bears a splendid resemblance to a Kut-Ku Wing by using the fowl's materials.

name: Blue Wing
description: Containing the scorching heat of a blue flame, many fall victim to its beauty.

name: Great Pincer
description: A Great Sword made from a giant pincer. Its blade rips of scales and slices meat.

name: Ceanataur Blade
description: Sharp Great Sword made from blue shell. Only the finest materials used in its blade.

name: Blue Claw Blade
description: Sharp Great Sword made from blue shell. Only the finest materials used in its blade.

name: Tactical Blade
description: Superb sharpness and high Attack power. An improved Ravager Blade.

name: Chrome Razor
description: As the name implies, it features A+ Sharpness infused with poison.

name: Bronze Coin
description: Mimics the design of ancient currency. The blade can be polished to a high luster.

name: Sieglinde
description: The ultimate Golem Blade. Treated for A+ Sharpness. Male and female versions.

name: Titernia
description: A Great Sword with a cherry blossom tint. One blow surely means death.

name: Kirin Thundersword
description: A blade that harnesses lightning and unleashes it into your victim's body.

name: Sword of the Diablos
description: An Axe made from two types of Diablos. One hit splits earth and crushes mountains.

name: Sentoryu Raven

name: Rathalos Firesword
description: Great Sword made with a Rathalos wing design. Flame Sac bestows Fire element.

name: Eternal Annihilator
description: Legendary dragon-killer. 'Wield me true, and you will cut dragon scale like silk.'

name: Ancient Blade
description: Made from metal that can't be smelted in the armory. Now undergoing research.

name: Steel Ice Blade

description: Steel Great Sword made from ancient Kushala Daora materials. Sharp and frozen.
